short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web extension for interacting with Platypush instances via browser and creating custom browser actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Platypush browser add-on is an extension (and meta-extension) that allows you to interact with Platypush instances from your browser. You can use it in many ways:

-    Quickly run Platypush actions on any host from your toolbar or browser menu. Controlling your lights, media, assistant and smart home device is just a click away.

-    Debug and explore Platypush actions.

-    Create your custom JavaScript actions to for deeper integration with your browser. You have full access both to the Platypush API and the browser Web Extension API. It means that you can easily create actions that connect the two worlds - like simplifying a web page, play some video on a page on Chromecast/Kodi, whitelist or block domains, send a page to your Kindle etc.

-    Attach custom JavaScript hooks that will run in your browser when Platypush events occur. Be notified in your browser of e.g. media being played on your device, or if the temperature or humidity in a room go above/below a certain threshold.
